main.name: Renu Suresh Ganvir
main.bio: I am a project engineer (Developer) at Wipro. I have worked on Angular based projects, as an interest, I have learned React and also done mini projects. I am hardworking and eager to learn new technology for the better tech development. In my free time I like to do art work, making greeting cards and orgami, I also like to visit orphanage home, in my during festival or if planning any tour.
